recommendations: Amit Jain
QA Project Manager(Senior Test Lead)
February 22, 2015, Jennifer was a client of Amit’s

Amit is an excellent QA Test Lead.  He's very detail-oriented and thorough, and he has great communication skills.  He takes the time to understand the industry in which he works, and functionality, so that he can be counted on as a subject matter expert.  I would welcome working with Amit again anytime, as he has always put his best foot forward in his work with me.

Hani Zion
Vice President
April 26, 2012, Jennifer managed Hani directly

Hani is extremely detail-oriented and hands-on, and has the gift of grasping complex technical functionalities very quickly.  He's ambitious and driven, and makes every effort to do everything he can to ensure success in any goal he has laid out.  Furthermore, Hani can be trusted to do what he says he will do without a lot of oversight, and generally he will even go above and beyond to find a better, more efficient way to do it.  Finally, Hani is a very nice guy who is personable and takes the time to get to know you.  I would work with Hani again any time.

Srinivas (KV) Vittal
Vice President - Program Management Office at Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ
April 26, 2012, Jennifer worked with Srinivas (KV) in different groups

Srinivas (KV) managed very complex projects on complicated financial applications, and managed to stay cool under pressure and get the job done successfully.  He is also extremely pleasant and genuinely very nice to know, which really does make a difference in how people on various teams (I was on the QA team) respond to him in his PM role.  Because you truly like KV, you tend to want to help him in making a project successful, and respond to him positively.  I very much enjoyed working with KV.

Nicklas Sajanti
Senior Technical Account Manager / IT Project Manager with 10+ years of experience at NASDAQ
February 17, 2012, Jennifer worked with Nicklas but at different companies

Nicklas was the primary responsible TAM (Tech Account Manager) from our backend software vendor, ensuring quality deliveries and troubleshooting/resolving any issues that arose.  Nicklas showed extreme professionalism and a true desire to ensure customer satisfaction with the product.  Additionally, his technical expertise was quite impressive, and his response time fantastic.  Without a doubt, I would recommend Nicklas to anyone and would welcome working with him myself any day.
